attributes.action: Increase the sentence on the parents of tragic baby P.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They both took his life away, the step father by beating and toruring him, the mother by standing by and letting it happen.
THIS IS MURDER.
The sentencing should reflect this.

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter of the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
